assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: ECONOS Co., Ltd. engages in the reuse product and low-carbon businesses in Japan. The company buys and sells reuse products through reuse shops and e-commerce, such as books, CDs, DVDs, game software, CD and DVD software, computers, audio and musical instruments, cameras, TVs, DVD players, toys, cards, figures, novelty items, car supplies and parts, tires, aluminum foil, plastic models, model guns, N gauges, minicars, trading cards, arcades, sports goods, camping supplies, precious metals, furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, baby goods, gift items, bicycles, fishing gears, interior and branded goods, bags, shoes, and general merchandise, as well as women's, men's, and children's clothing. It also engages in the carbon-offset business, which includes buying and selling of greenhouse gas emission rights; trading and selling of greenhouse gases; creation of emission credits; reduction of emissions consulting; and consignment survey businesses. In addition, the company is involved in the repair business. It operates 62 franchise stores, including 1 e-commerce department store. The company serves a range of customers ranging from children to senior citizens. The company was formerly known as Kitami Cygnus Shoji Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ECONOS Co., Ltd. in March 2005. ECONOS Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Tomohiro  Fujiwara
